title: Maximum potential benefits
context: §383-24 Maximum potential benefits. The maximum potential benefits of an eligible individual in a benefit year shall be twenty-six times the eligible individual&rsquo;s weekly benefit amount. [L 1939, c 219, §3(e); am L 1941, c 304, §1, pt of subs 15; RL 1945, §4217; am L 1955, c 16, §1(a); RL 1955, §93-23; am L 1965, c 250, §1(b); HRS §383-24; gen ch 1985]
